name: Recklessly Reaching for Riches
text: When you draw a card(s) for your normal draw in your Draw Phase: You can reveal 1 of those cards; place it on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. When you draw a card(s) by a card effect: You can reveal 1 of those cards; send this card to the GY, and if you do, place the revealed card on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do that, draw 1 card.
